name: Stats:
description:
§oMax Shifts§r: 4
Height: 13, 12.5, 12, 11.5
§oSpeed§r: 2.3, 2.3, 2, 2
§oStrength§r: 4.5, 4, 3.5, 3
§oHealth§r: 2, 1.8, 1.6, 1.4
§oDefense§r: 1.2, 1.1, 1, 1
§oDurability§r: 20

comment: This is the same as the injection index, except Founding is moved to 0

actions.command: execute as @s at @s run particle dust 1.0 1.0 0.0 1 ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 100 1 normal
execute as @s at @s run particle minecraft:electric_spark ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 0 1 normal

self_action.command: title @s actionbar "This weapon is too small for you"

actions.command: title @s actionbar "You're too big to ride that"

if_action.command: execute anchored feet facing ^1 ^ ^ run tp @e[tag=BeingGrabbedByTitan,distance=..40,sort=nearest,limit=1] ^ ^20.5 ^10

else_action.command: execute anchored feet facing ^1 ^ ^ run tp @e[tag=BeingGrabbedByTitan,distance=..30,sort=nearest,limit=1] ^ ^5.25 ^3

actions.command: item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with titan_shifter_megapack:titan_skin_warhammer{Powers:[{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "mainhand", Negative: 0b},{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "offhand", Negative: 0b}],display:{Lore:['{"text":"Only usable by Titans"}'],Name:'{"text":"Titan-Skin Warhammer","color":"white","bold":true}'},Unbreakable:1b,WarhammerHardenedItem:1} 1

item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with titan_shifter_megapack:titan_skin_crossbow{Powers:[{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "mainhand", Negative: 0b},{Hidden:1b, Power: "phantom:assign/warhammer_item", Slot: "offhand", Negative: 0b}],display:{Name:'{"text":"Titan-Skin Crossbow","color":"white","bold":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Only usable by Titans"}']},Unbreakable:1b,WarhammerHardenedItem:1,ChargedProjectiles:[{id:"minecraft:arrow",Count:1b},{},{}],Charged:1b} 1

action.comment: This is more than 4 HP, because you already deal extra damage to begin with
